data.name: Expo_Cutscene_Line_001
data.value: Greetings.[pause=0]I am Cresselia,[pause=30] the Pokémon of the crescent moon.[br]I was once a part of the guild of legend,[pause=30] aiding its master before they left this world.

data.name: Expo_Cutscene_Line_002_Default
data.value: {0}...[pause=0] the others have told me of your endeavors.

data.name: Expo_Cutscene_Line_002_Postgame
data.value: {0}...[pause=0] I have heard of your exploits,[pause=30] and your reaching the top of Guildmaster Summit.

data.name: Expo_Cutscene_Line_003
data.value: To find your way here is no small feat.

data.name: Expo_Cutscene_Ask_Join
data.value: Would you like me to aid you, as I did with them?

data.name: Expo_Cutscene_Line_005
data.value: I see that same spark in your eyes.[pause=0] You hold the same promise.

data.name: Expo_Cutscene_Line_Reject
data.value: Until another team shows promise to carry on their legacy, I shall remain here.

data.name: Expo_Cutscene_Line_006
data.value: However![pause=0]\nYou must first prove yourselves to me!

data.name: Expo_Cutscene_Line_007
data.value: Show me the lengths you will go to protect those by your side!

data.name: Post_Cutscene_Line_Fail
data.value: You still have much to learn about selflessness.[pause=0]\nUntil that day arrives,[pause=30] I will remain here.

data.name: Post_Cutscene_Line_Success
data.value: I see it now.[pause=0] You heart is pure,[pause=30] and your motives are selfless.

data.name: Expo_Cutscene_Line_Accept
data.value: Then I, Cresselia, will gladly join your team.
